languages.text: "Спасительный свет, ведущий людей сквозь мрак — это свет святой Терры, и только он".

traits.locale_text: "Их поведение было отступлением от инструкицй. А значит — ересью".

languages.text: "The light of salvation that guides people through darkness is the light of Holy Terra. It is the only light."
languages.original_text: "Спасительный свет, ведущий людей сквозь мрак — это свет святой Терры, и только он".

traits.locale_text: "The light of salvation that guides people through darkness is the light of Holy Terra. It is the only light."

languages.text: « C'est la lumière de la Sainte Terra qui guide les peuples à travers l'obscurité. Elle est la seule clarté. »
languages.original_text: "The light of salvation that guides people through darkness is the light of Holy Terra. It is the only light."

traits.locale_text: « C'est la lumière de la Sainte Terra qui guide les peuples à travers l'obscurité. Elle est la seule clarté. »

languages.text: “引导人类穿越黑暗的救赎之光，只有神圣泰拉之光。它是唯一的光。”
languages.original_text: "The light of salvation that guides people through darkness is the light of Holy Terra. It is the only light."

traits.locale_text: “引导人类穿越黑暗的救赎之光，只有神圣泰拉之光。它是唯一的光。”

languages.text: "Das Licht der Erlösung, das die Leute durch die Dunkelheit führt, ist das Licht des Heiligen Terra. Es ist das einzige Licht."
languages.original_text: "The light of salvation that guides people through darkness is the light of Holy Terra. It is the only light."

traits.locale_text: "Das Licht der Erlösung, das die Leute durch die Dunkelheit führt, ist das Licht des Heiligen Terra. Es ist das einzige Licht."

languages.text: «La luz de la salvación que guía a la gente en momentos oscuros es la de la Sagrada Terra. Es la única luz».
languages.original_text: "The light of salvation that guides people through darkness is the light of Holy Terra. It is the only light."

traits.locale_text: «La luz de la salvación que guía a la gente en momentos oscuros es la de la Sagrada Terra. Es la única luz».

languages.text: 「暗闇の中で人々を導く救いの光は、聖なる地球の光である。それが唯一の光だ」
languages.original_text: "The light of salvation that guides people through darkness is the light of Holy Terra. It is the only light."

traits.locale_text: 「暗闇の中で人々を導く救いの光は、聖なる地球の光である。それが唯一の光だ」

languages.text: "İnsanlara karanlıkta yol gösteren kurtuluş ışığı, Kutsal Terra'nın nurudur. Tek ışık odur."
languages.original_text: "The light of salvation that guides people through darkness is the light of Holy Terra. It is the only light."

traits.locale_text: "İnsanlara karanlıkta yol gösteren kurtuluş ışığı Kutsal Terra'nın nurudur. Tek ışık odur."
